panels.title: Tables btree - amount of leaf/branch/overflow pages
Tables density - amount keys per page
getrusage: nvcsw/sec - context switch due to voluntarily giving up the processor (resource wait), nivcsw

Process Mem: system - obtained from OS,  alloc - allocated
